articles.title: Suresh Raina set to return to cricket, will play for UP in Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Raina announced his retirement from International cricket in August this year, but the World Cup-winning cricketer will continue to play domestic cricket for his native state of Uttar Pradesh and in the Indian Premier League.
